name: Trials Of The Mage
description:
Trials Of The Mage

My entry for "Dungeon Crawler Jam 2023"  https://itch.io/jam/dcjam2023

Notes:
- Due to limited time spend, there are no item drops (it was planned to have spell scrolls being dropped or found from dungeon.. so now you just need to look carefully on the walls to find 2 opposite spells, which was the theme idea to have opposite spells for opposite enemies)

Quide:

Left mouse button: Draw into rune board to cast spells (center of screen)
WASD: Move
Q/E: Rotate
M: Music on/off
ESC: Menu
